tech.name: Bun
tech.description: Bun is an ultra-fast JavaScript runtime with a built-in bundler, test runner, and package manager. It's designed for speed and developer experience.

tech.name: Drizzle ORM
tech.description: Drizzle is a TypeScript ORM that provides excellent type safety and performance. It supports PostgreSQL, MySQL, and SQLite with a simple, intuitive API.

tech.name: React Aria Components
tech.description: React Aria Components provides accessible, internationalized UI components with built-in behavior and interactions, allowing you to focus on design.

tech.name: Lingui
tech.description: Lingui is a modern i18n library for JavaScript and React. It provides a simple API for internationalization with excellent TypeScript support.

tech.name: Tailwind CSS v4
tech.description: Tailwind CSS v4 is a utility-first CSS framework with enhanced performance and new features like OKLCH color support for modern, accessible designs.

tech.name: Docker
tech.description: Docker enables containerization for consistent development and deployment environments. It simplifies application packaging and ensures portability across different platforms.

tech.name: Dragonfly
tech.description: Dragonfly is a modern in-memory datastore, fully compatible with Redis and Memcached APIs, designed for high performance and efficiency.
